analysis.key_quote: If the President can easily and quickly hollow out agencies, the agencies will be unable to fulfill their legal mission.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of job protections for civil servants and expressing concerns about politicization and the potential for abuse of power by the President. It highlights the value of a merit-based system and the need for civil servants to have the ability to speak up against political overreach.
